description: Returns true if all values in an array pass the predicate test.

parameters.description: This function is called for each value in the first array in values or until false is returned. If no calls return false, the result is true.
parameters.name: predicate

parameters.description: These are the parameters passed to predicate with the exception that the first array is passed one value at a time. At least one array is required.
parameters.name: values
